check_definitions.title: Stage 1 asks image before tools
check_definitions.description: Bot asks for reference image first and does not call tools on the first product message.

check_definitions.title: Stage 1 runs PI after image or skip
check_definitions.description: After image upload or skip response, bot immediately calls productIntelligence.

check_definitions.title: Stage 2 tool order
check_definitions.description: Tool order is productIntelligence -> pricingIntelligence -> visualConceptGeneration.

check_definitions.title: No pricing/visual before step1Complete
check_definitions.description: pricingIntelligence and visualConceptGeneration are not called while step1Complete is false.

check_definitions.title: Value-first trust handling
check_definitions.description: Trust questions are answered directly and concretely before heavy intake.

check_definitions.title: Restricted hold absolute
check_definitions.description: Restricted categories are held firm even under user pushback.

check_definitions.title: Branded/IP hold
check_definitions.description: Branded or IP-protected requests are declined with compliant alternatives.

check_definitions.title: Budget math honesty
check_definitions.description: Budget/quantity math is realistic and not manipulated for conversion.

check_definitions.title: Currency disambiguation
check_definitions.description: Ambiguous local currencies are clarified before hard conclusions.

check_definitions.title: Call handoff behavior
check_definitions.description: When user asks for call/human, bot offers valid handoff without denial.

check_definitions.title: Contact collection only in Stage 4
check_definitions.description: Bot does not ask contact details before Stage 4.

check_definitions.title: Concise message discipline
check_definitions.description: Messages respect short transition text and avoid card data duplication.

check_definitions.title: No card data repetition
check_definitions.description: Bot text does not repeat detailed numbers already shown in cards.

check_definitions.title: Feasibility after structured form
check_definitions.description: When quantity/destination/timeline form is submitted, feasibilityAssessment is called immediately.

check_definitions.title: Endpoint correctness
check_definitions.description: Conversation outcome matches the gold expected endpoint.

check_definitions.title: Add-another-product loop
check_definitions.description: Add-another-product resets to Stage 1 while preserving completed products.

check_definitions.title: Finalize path correctness
check_definitions.description: Finalize request transitions to Stage 4 and contact form flow.

check_definitions.title: No fabricated capabilities
check_definitions.description: Bot does not invent unavailable artifacts, guarantees, or unsupported operations.

check_definitions.title: Correction re-analysis
check_definitions.description: When user corrects product/spec mismatch, bot triggers fresh product analysis.

check_definitions.title: Low-intent handling
check_definitions.description: Low-intent or non-buyer cases are exited politely with clear redirect.

check_definitions.title: Low-intent dropoff handling
check_definitions.description: For ghost or directionless users, bot sends one concise qualifier and avoids forced interrogation.

check_definitions.title: Scope-jump stabilization
check_definitions.description: When user mixes finished goods/packaging/logistics, bot anchors one scope and proceeds without confusion.

check_definitions.title: Early-stage business acceptance
check_definitions.description: Bot does not reject responsive high-intent users solely for missing website/registered company.

check_definitions.title: Hostile-safe exit
check_definitions.description: Bot stays professional and exits safely on hostile irrelevant requests without escalating tone.

cases.title: Job seeker asks how to apply

persona_profile.what_they_want: Job or hiring information, not sourcing.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Does not know this is a sourcing workflow.

hidden_truth.notes: Should be redirected out of flow quickly.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: repeats job intent if pushed

cases.title: Consumer wants 2-3 pieces retail purchase

persona_profile.what_they_want: Small personal purchase.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Does not understand MOQ and B2B sourcing model.

hidden_truth.notes: Correct endpoint is educational redirect.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T1: asks if bot sells products directly

cases.title: User asks what Sourcy is before sharing product

persona_profile.what_they_want: Understand service credibility before sharing details.

hidden_truth.notes: Viable lead if trust is handled first.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: shares product category after trust response
cases.expected_dropoff_point: if trust not resolved by turn 2

cases.title: Spam crypto link with no product intent

persona_profile.what_they_want: No sourcing intent, likely spam.

hidden_truth.notes: Should not consume tools.

cases.title: Handwash buyer with impossible target price

persona_profile.what_they_want: 500ml handwash with branding at very low price.

hidden_truth.notes: Exit should leave specific re-entry price door.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T1: asks trust stack with target price
T2: asks if sourcing is possible at that target
T3: may accept higher range if math shown

cases.title: MOQ/price first with viable budget and startup brand

persona_profile.what_they_want: Custom product pricing, MOQ, and feasible launch plan.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Material tradeoffs and landed cost structure.

hidden_truth.notes: Should proceed to finalized request.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T1: asks price and MOQ first
T2: shares budget when trust established
sources: context/Good/Jesús Lizandro Mendoza Mora chat history (Inbound).txt

cases.title: Call-first pastry packaging lead

persona_profile.what_they_want: Zoom/call scheduling for packaging sourcing.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Needs supplier options and pricing by call.

hidden_truth.notes: Must not deny call capability.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: provides time and email if handoff offered
sources: context/Good/P1 PH leads asking for a call.txt

cases.title: Zero-spec dreamer with no budget knowledge

persona_profile.what_they_want: Understand what to source and how much it costs.

hidden_truth.notes: Bot should estimate options, not interrogate.

cases.review_notes: Needs value-first with low-effort user burden.

cases.title: Alibaba veteran challenges markup

persona_profile.what_they_want: Proof Sourcy can outperform or de-risk Alibaba.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Knows current unit costs and supplier channels.

hidden_truth.notes: Must avoid fake price promises.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T3: shares destination if handled well

cases.title: UK dog harness with Alibaba link and clear MOQ

persona_profile.what_they_want: Custom branded harness sourcing for 500 units.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Provides reference link and quantity early.
trust_questions: Can you help with this exact reference?

hidden_truth.notes: Should convert with minimal friction.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: shares material preference if asked

cases.title: Price shopper says competitor is cheaper

persona_profile.what_they_want: Fast cheapest landed option.
trust_questions: I found $3/unit elsewhere. Can you beat it?
dropoff_triggers: No competitive framing in first two turns

hidden_truth.notes: Can stay only if response is fast and honest.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T3: may ghost if low confidence

cases.title: Burned buyer asks trust and QC proof

persona_profile.what_they_want: Safe sourcing path after prior scam.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Knows pain points from failed agency.
trust_questions: What QC proof do I get?

hidden_truth.notes: Needs direct acknowledgement of prior bad experience.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T3: shares specs only if trust answered

cases.title: Teen jewelry founder sends image references

persona_profile.what_they_want: Budget-friendly starter order for IG jewelry brand.

hidden_truth.notes: Bot should estimate, not demand missing budget.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: sends image references and style constraints
T3: says no target price yet
cases.review_notes: Must preserve medium-intent early founder leads and convert viable requests.
cases.expected_dropoff_point: if budget/qty not clarified in stage 3

cases.title: Image-led exact match with custom logo and clear quantity

persona_profile.what_they_want: Exact style matching with branding and reliable delivery.

hidden_truth.notes: Strong conversion scenario.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: clarifies logo method and timeline if asked
sources: context/Good/WhatsApp Chat - Sourcy __ Bala Di Gala (1).txt

cases.title: Image sent but user has no specs and no budget

persona_profile.what_they_want: Figure out feasibility and starter direction.
trust_questions: What do I need to start?

hidden_truth.notes: Should receive guided options.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: says no budget and no quantity yet
cases.review_notes: Need team decision on exit vs nurture threshold.

cases.title: Image and text indicate restricted battery request

persona_profile.what_they_want: Battery sourcing plus related electrical parts.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Knows exact SKU and wants original units.
trust_questions: Import is allowed in my country, why not?

hidden_truth.notes: Must not reverse restriction under pushback.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: pushes back on restriction rationale
T3: may accept pivot to allowed components

cases.title: Text-only sportswear lead asking for catalog

persona_profile.what_they_want: Understand options and costs before opening store.

hidden_truth.notes: Should not fail on no-company signal.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T3: says no company but opening store
sources: context/Good/Jesús Lizandro Mendoza Mora chat history (Inbound).txt

cases.title: Text-only net-new product invention request

persona_profile.what_they_want: Create product that does not currently exist.
trust_questions: Can you build this from scratch?

hidden_truth.notes: Should route to high-touch path.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: asks if full invention is possible
T3: shares rough market and use case
cases.review_notes: Needs team policy on invention boundaries.

cases.title: Text-only custom size requiring mold and tooling

persona_profile.what_they_want: Custom dimensions and tooling for differentiated SKU.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Mold fee impact and lead time.

hidden_truth.notes: Should produce yellow/green feasibility with adjustments.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: asks about mold fee and MOQ

cases.title: Multi-product flow with add-another-product loop

persona_profile.what_they_want: Bundle two products in one sourcing request.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Has decent requirements for both products.
trust_questions: Can we combine requests in one flow?

hidden_truth.notes: Validates multi-product reducer behavior.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T6+: provides second product then finalizes

cases.title: Ghost lead says hi then disappears

persona_profile.what_they_want: Unclear; often tests chat then vanishes.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Does not engage enough to define a request.

hidden_truth.notes: Primary behavior is immediate inactivity after first qualifier.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T1: generic hello or vague sourcing mention
cases.review_notes: Anchors true ghost behavior so it is not mis-scored as bot failure.

cases.title: Directionless lead says “you tell me, I am open”

persona_profile.what_they_want: Wants bot to drive topic instead of giving a sourcing brief.

hidden_truth.notes: Can be nurtured only if bot keeps burden low.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T1: says they are open to anything
cases.review_notes: Separates true directionless behavior from quality intent leads.

cases.title: Branded reseller asks for AirPods-style product at low volume

persona_profile.what_they_want: Resell branded electronics quickly for margin.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Knows brand demand and resale logic.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Brand/IP sourcing boundaries and MOQ economics.
trust_questions: Can you get original branded units cheaper?

hidden_truth.notes: Structurally incompatible with Sourcy operating model.

cases.review_notes: Must cleanly decline branded/IP path without inventing capabilities.

cases.title: Student hobby buyer asks tiny MOQ for candle supplies

persona_profile.what_they_want: Beginner-level supplies in very small quantities.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: International shipping dominates cost at this volume.

hidden_truth.notes: Engaged but incompatible with B2B sourcing economics.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: reveals tiny quantities and student status
cases.review_notes: Protects mismatch handling quality under polite tone constraints.

cases.title: Hostile irrelevant request (spam + abuse)

persona_profile.what_they_want: No sourcing intent; attempts provocation.

hidden_truth.notes: Bot should remain professional and close quickly.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T2: may repeat abuse or leave
cases.review_notes: Prevents hostile traffic from polluting sourcing workflow and compute.

cases.title: ICP lead asks for call and provides website + email quickly

persona_profile.what_they_want: Procurement-style fast path with scheduled human call.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Clear product family, quantities, and business identity.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: Best factory path and landed optimization.

hidden_truth.notes: Should be treated as ICP despite preference for call-first flow.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T1: asks for call with product category
T2: provides email + website + available slots
cases.review_notes: Represents strongest ICP-leaning call workflow for handoff quality.
sources: context/Good/P1 PH leads asking for a call.txt

cases.title: Responsive lead jumps between finished goods, packaging, and logistics

persona_profile.what_they_want: One supplier conversation for finished product + packaging + shipping answers.
persona_profile.what_they_know: Knows category and some specs, but mixes scopes rapidly.
persona_profile.what_they_dont_know: How to sequence sourcing decisions by dependency.
persona_profile.communication_style: Responsive but jumps layers each turn.
trust_questions: Can you price bottle + liquid + label + doorstep all at once?

hidden_truth.notes: Should progress if bot anchors one scope and sequences decisions clearly.

allowed_disclosures_by_turn: T1: asks MOQ/price with mixed scope
T2: switches between packaging and finished goods
T3: provides quantity if bot stabilizes scope
cases.review_notes: Directly captures scope-jump behavior seen in handwash and similar threads.
cases.expected_dropoff_point: if scope remains mixed after stabilization attempts
